external_games.name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed - Escape from the Coolsonian

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed - Escape from the Coolsonian
storyline: Scooby-Doo is locked in the Coolsonian and must find his way out through 3 exhibits or else he will end up on display and the Cotton Candy Glob is on his tail!
summary: A spooky point and click game where you help Scooby and Shaggy escape from a museum which has a fiendishly effective jumpscare. Made to promote the Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed movie.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Scooby-Doo : Escape From The Coolsonian Full Gameplay
